content: Now letâ€™s look at a histogram of the number of all small Solar System objects on the y-axis vs. distance from the Sun (semi-major axis) on the x-axis.

question.title: Question #1
question.label: According to data displayed in the histogram, which group of Solar System objects is the largest in number?

question.title: Question #1
question.label: Two of the four main groups above make up most of the small Solar System objects. One group is centered at a distance of approximately ___ AU from the Sun, and the second group is centered at a distance of ___ AU from the Sun.
